game.name: Automation - The Car Company Tycoon Game
game.genres: 인디, 레이싱, 시뮬레이션, 전략, 앞서 해보기
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 멀티플레이어, PvP, 온라인 PvP, Steam 창작마당, Steam Cloud, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Make your dream cars a reality with Automation’s unparalleled car and engine design tools. Gain a competitive edge through smart engineering and business decisions to help you build an automotive empire. Will you become an industry leader, or just a footnote in automotive history?
game.shortDescriptionEn: Make your dream cars a reality with Automation’s unparalleled car and engine design tools. Gain a competitive edge through smart engineering and business decisions to help you build an automotive empire. Will you become an industry leader, or just a footnote in automotive history?

reviewHighlights.text: good game for making own cars and engines. Also for killing time
